name: Super Baby (Rudberg Studios)
description:
When the parents are out of the house and the babysitter isnt paying attention, you as a superpowerd baby can destroy the house!

This was made in a week for the Brackeys Game jam with the theme "Let there be chaos".

everything was created by me (Amit Rudberg) including the music and sound effects (Thanks to my little sister for laughing in the mic. Just adorable)

Have fun!
